description: You really can't go wrong with this very easy No Knead Hot Cross Buns recipe this Easter. . It's virtually foolproof with no kneading involved at all!
keywords: dairy-free hot cross buns, no knead hot cros buns, vegan hot cross buns recipes
name: No Knead Hot Cross Buns
recipeIngredient: 50g / 1/3 cup whole hazelnuts (OPTIONAL) (, roughly chopped into large pieces, (optional but they add great texture and flavour)
500g / 4 cups all purpose white flour or bread flour (, in the UK use strong flour)
2 1/2 teaspoons instant or quick yeast (, sometimes labelled fast yeast)
1/2 teaspoon ground cardamon (OPTIONAL but adds a nice flavour)
265g / 1 1/2 cups mixed dried fruit (, such as golden raisins, sultanas, cranberries, chopped dried apricot. )
enough water to make a thick pipe-able paste

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the raw hazelnuts onto a baking tray and roast for about 10 mins. Shake the pan after 5 mins and keep an eye on them as they can burn fast. Remove them from the oven and let cool.
